channel.title: Community on Molecule
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Molecule

item.title: Seattle tutorial
item.description: Seattle tutorial - with molecules Credits: This tutorial is based on the original Datomic Seattle tutorial (there is also a new tutorial) and some text passages have been quoted as-is or been slightly modified to describe how Molecule works. Introduction After setting up the database and populating it with data we can start making queries. We make queries by building “molecules” which are chains of attributes put together with the builder pattern.
